definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Gentlemen, sir, have been charged with giving birth to sedition in America.
sentences.chinese: 先生们，议员被指责在亚美利加进行煽动。

sentences.english: I, too, am now singing America.
sentences.chinese: 我如今也在为亚美利加歌唱。

sentences.english: Nothing less will content me than whole America.
sentences.chinese: 完整的亚美利加会使我感到最大的满意。

sentences.english: For the next number , he 'll sing "" Beautiful America "" .
sentences.chinese: 他要唱的下地支歌是“美丽的亚美利加”。

sentences.english: I hear America singing, its varied carols I hear.
sentences.chinese: 我听见亚美利加在歌唱，多种多样的欢歌回响耳际。

sentences.english: For the first time, the word "America" was in print.
sentences.chinese: “亚美利加”这个词第一次印到了纸上。

sentences.english: Also, I like Amerika and The Trial.
sentences.chinese: 我也喜欢《亚美利加》以及《审判》。

sentences.english: I would fain know by whom an American is represented here.
sentences.chinese: 我很想知道谁在这里代表亚美利加人？

definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
